article.name: What kind of configuration is Mackerel's connectivity monitoring working with?
article.title: What kind of configuration is Mackerel's connectivity monitoring working with?
article.body:
If data transmission from mackerel-agent installed on a host registered in Mackerel becomes interrupted for a certain period of time, it will be determined NG and a connectivity alert will be issued.

The time threshold that is used to determine an NG status remains undisclosed due to the fact that it is adjusted on a day-to-day basis. This specification cannot be changed by the user.
